tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords ( 
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    applicant_id INT NOT NULL, 
    medical_condition VARCHAR(255), 
    underwriter_notes TEXT, 
    claim_status VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE underwriting (
    applicant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    medical_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE claims_processing (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id INT,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    claim_reason TEXT,
    claim_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE underwriting ( 
  id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  policy_id INT, 
  applicant_name VARCHAR(255), 
  age INT, 
  health_status VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE claims_processing ( 
  claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  policy_id INT, 
  claimant_name VARCHAR(255), 
  claim_amount DECIMAL(10,2), 
  claim_status VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE policy_information ( 
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  policy_holder_name VARCHAR(255), 
  policy_type VARCHAR(50), 
  start_date DATE, 
  end_date DATE 
);

CREATE TABLE claim (
    claim_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_id UUID,
    claim_date DATE,
    claim_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    claim_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    applicant_id UUID,
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis TEXT,
    treatment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Underwriting (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   applicant_name TEXT,
   age INT,
   gender TEXT,
   occupation TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Medical_History (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   applicant_id INT,
   diagnosis TEXT,
   treatment TEXT,
   date_recorded DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Claims (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   policy_number TEXT,
   claim_amount DECIMAL,
   claim_status TEXT,
   processing_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Policy_Holder (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   policy_number TEXT,
   holder_name TEXT,
   contact_number TEXT,
   email TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Insurance_Company (
   company_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   company_name TEXT,
   address TEXT,
   contact_number TEXT,
   website TEXT
);
